Text:
Wow! I've been looking for this for ages! I'm a bit of a late arrival to TPB and I couldn't find this anywhere!

I, like you, first saw this on British television as a kid and was immediately hooked. I've only ever seen it twice and I hope its appeal hasn't faded after all these years.

Thanks a bunch!
Been stuck at 99.4 for a week now :-( Will seed to 500% when the download's finished, but in the mean time could more seed, please?
Got it! Will seed as promised and will uncap U/L speed. Thanks for this, petesdragon.
been looking for this film a lifetime please seed i need seeders lol
